This interface may help you understand h: This interface may help you understand how the Node can be configured and get some info on how to connect to other GlobaLeaks users and experts.
Ovo sučelje Vam može pomoći razumjeti kako zviždač koristi nod. Prezentiramo Vam predaje koje se trenutno nalaze na nodu i nekoliko statistika o vrsti upotrebe (aktivnost, datoteke, komentari).

With a HTTPS submission you are exposing: S HTTPS predajom izlažete se riziku da će netko znati da ste predali nešto, bez da zna što ste predali.
You acknowledge that failure to do so wi: Prihvaćate da ako to ne učinite, nećemo biti u mogućnosti tehnički zaštititi Vašu anonimnost.

You have not configured your encryption: You have not configured your encryption keys, so the files will be stored on the GlobaLeaks node un-encrypted.
